text:
Bro, you were quite irritating at the beginning but good thing is you remain irritating throughout thee college. But you are one of my best friend and a nice person atleast for me. aur thoda khana jyada khaya karo.
miss you bro
author: Rajat  Patel

text:
Bro, you will always be the best roommate ever born on the face of the planet. Bas gaano ki volume dheere rakha kar. I will always miss those long walks in the night near GH (IYKWIM) talking about random shit and discussion about Nitesh being an ass.
Miss you bro
author: Rajat  Patel
